content: This ticket mentioned R4, R4B, and R5. Does the resolution apply to all three versions or just R5?
R4B and R5. (Corrections to R4 are made through R4B)

The resolution of FHIR-33062 is "Will remove reference to that StructureDefinition (http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/document-section-library)". In the StructureDefinition example page, there is a "Example showing how to define Section Level Profiles example-section-library". I am wondering if the resolution should be "fix reference to StructureDefinition http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/example-section-library"
@Ward Weistra

Stepping in for Ward here. It seems that fixing the reference to the StructureDefinition would also resolve the issue we encounter with the package creation. I think both solutions would work for us. @Yunwei Wang

@Yunwei Wang This the change you had in mind + correct way to apply it?

  • I've made https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/1594 against master (which I assume goes to R5?)
  • And https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/1595 against R4B branch
@Ward Weistra both approved. Thank you for fixing this issue.
